an4.2:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi asamannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya papatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:1.3: Ariyena, bhikkhave, silena asamannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya papatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:1.4: Ariyena, bhikkhave, samadhina asamannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya papatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:1.5: Ariyaya, bhikkhave, pannaya asamannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya papatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:1.6: Ariyaya, bhikkhave, vimuttiya asamannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya papatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:1.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi asamannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya papatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya apapatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:2.3: Ariyena, bhikkhave, silena samannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya apapatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:2.4: Ariyena, bhikkhave, samadhina samannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya apapatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:2.5: Ariyaya, bhikkhave, pannaya samannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya apapatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:2.6: Ariyaya, bhikkhave, vimuttiya samannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya apapatito’ti vuccati.
an4.2:2.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ‘imasma dhammavinaya apapatito’ti vuccatiti.
